RandomEncounter.KeybindHint: When set, will trigger the random encounters for the scene regardless of when time was set
RandomEncounter.button.name: Configure Random Encounters
RandomEncounter.button.label: Configure
RandomEncounter.intro: To Create a new Random Encounter, click the Add Encounter button at the bottom, Give it a name, Select a scene, Set how often to roll the table (optional), Set Chance for rolling the table (optional), Create or Link to a RollTable
RandomEncounter.name.label: Encounter Name
RandomEncounter.scene.label: Scene
RandomEncounter.rooms.label: Rooms
RandomEncounter.rooms.hint: OPTIONAL: Define specific rooms for random encounters using drawing text, will check if any PC is in room to trigger a random encounter. Multiple rooms split by a comma ','
RandomEncounter.time.label: Time, in minutes
RandomEncounter.time.hint: OPTIONAL: Uses about-time to trigger the random encounter
RandomEncounter.chance.label: Dice Formula
RandomEncounter.chance.hint: OPTIONAL: The dice formula required to check if an encounter happens, ex: 1d12, 1d20
RandomEncounter.onresult.label: On Result
RandomEncounter.onresult.hint: REQUIRED if using Dice Formula: Trigger RollTable on dice formula result, use - for ranges i.e. 18-20
RandomEncounter.rolltable.label: RollTable
RandomEncounter.daynight.label: Roll Day or Night?
RandomEncounter.daynight.hint: OPTIONAL: Select None for both, otherwise will use Lighting settings to determine Day/Night
RandomEncounter.SaveNameError: You must provide an Encounter Name
RandomEncounter.compendium.name: Configure
RandomEncounter.compendium.label: Include Tables from Compendiums?
RandomEncounter.compendium.hint: OPTIONAL: Select from a list of Compendium RollTables to include when creating a new random encounter
RandomEncounter.compendium.intro: Select what RollTable Compendiums to include when creating a new Random Encounter
